divs: sighting detailswhile watching a military documentary on netflix, i observed an object fly near an apache helicopter twice during the same segment. the documentary was entitled "future weapons season 1 episode 5. the place, date and time of the documentary is unknown. the object can be seen at times 27:03 and 27:47 min\secs into the 42 minute episode. attached are two digital camera shots of the computer screen of the events as depicted. the documentary is of course copyrighted and the two screen shots are only submitted as visual evidence to pique mufon's possible interest in investigating the above named video further. this is not the first time thst unusual objects have been captured by professional photographers and moviemakers. the fact that these types of events are able to pass through undetected, the video editing process, is a boon to the study of the ufo phenomenom. thank you mufon for your good work
